question.body: All of the abdominal arteries are in pairs except __________.

multiple_choice.choice: Middle suprarenal, Renal, and Gonadal arteries
Superior and inferior mesenteric arteries, celiac trunk, middle suprarenal arteries
Inferior phrenic, celiac trunk, and the median sacral artery
Superior and inferior mesenteric arteries, celiac trunk, and the median sacral artery

response.feedback: Incorrect. All of these arteries are paired arteries.
Incorrect. The middle suprarenal arteries are paired.
Incorrect. The inferior phrenic arteries are paired arteries.
Correct. All of these arteries are unpaired.
